name: After the Portal
description:
Story: You are on an alien planet. Help Doc to get to his portal and come back home!

Background art: https://vnitti.itch.io/glacial-mountains-parallax-background

Note: This is my very first published and finished game.

The game was made using the Godot Game Engine.

Special Thansk to:

Fritata - Helping, memeing

Sim - just for fun

Hoemi -physix

Jack Sparrow - who was with me with his music when I was bored

TT Games - to inspire me and know there are always better games then mine are
